page.title: 04MICKLEY SCHOOL FAIR
page.content:
At the Summer Fair we had lots of games and stalls. You could win a lot of things and buy cakes, books and toys. There was a Tombola but I did not win a prize because I did not have a nought or five at the end of my ticket number. There was Fishing for Pop, a Brantub and a Hide and Seek game. In a game Shower the Flower you had to throw a wet sponge at someone's face. This was great fun. In the Super Raffle the first prize was a food voucher. Certificates and prizes were presented to winners in the painting competition organised by the school for the church gymkhana. I really enjoyed the fair. The money raised helps the school to buy extra things.
{Katharine J. Smith age 8}
